rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Room
rooms.vastu_alignment: East-West axis for positive energy flow
rooms.description: Large open space with high ceilings that serves as a reception area and combined living space. Windows and skylights ensure natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open plan dining space adjacent to the living area. Features a sliding glass door leading to an outdoor terrace.

rooms.name: Kitchen & Pantry
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances. The pantry is integrated to store food efficiently.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A private guest room with ample natural light and ventilation. Adjacent balcony for fresh air.

rooms.name: Utility Room & Storage
rooms.description: Functional storage space for utilities, cleaning supplies, and other household essentials.

openings.description: Large double door entrance designed for ease of access and security.
Door leading to a private balcony with an unobstructed view of the sky.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.vastu_alignment: Northeast to harness positive energy and health
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony. Designed for comfort and privacy.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed for one of the children with ample space and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Child Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed for the second child with ample space and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Study/Workroom
rooms.description: Dedicated study/work area with proper ventilation and ample light.

openings.description: Private balcony door for the master bedroom offering serene views.

rooms.name: Entertainment & Lounge Area
rooms.description: Luxurious space combining a living area with an entertainment zone. Large windows ensure natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Private Gym & Spa
rooms.description: Fully equipped gym and spa area designed with high ceilings and large windows to promote a healthy lifestyle.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Outdoor swimming pool area integrated with landscaping. Designed with retractable shades and natural ventilation.

openings.description: Large door leading to a sunroom that connects the penthouse level with an outdoor terrace.

vastu_considerations: The design follows Vastu principles by aligning key functional areas in auspicious directions and ensuring natural light and ventilation.
